body_html:
@apaszke

I checked all the things we have this check for, there are three cases:

  • Target is of integral type, so the check would never be reached
  • Derivative already supported
  • Unsupported we get this error message which seems sufficient
RuntimeError: the derivative for 'target' is not implemented
body_text:
@apaszke
I checked all the things we have this check for, there are three cases:

Target is of integral type, so the check would never be reached
Derivative already supported
Unsupported we get this error message which seems sufficient

RuntimeError: the derivative for 'target' is not implemented
body:
@apaszke 

I checked all the things we have this check for, there are three cases:
- Target is of integral type, so the check would never be reached
- Derivative already supported
- Unsupported we get this error message which seems sufficient
```
RuntimeError: the derivative for 'target' is not implemented
```
